intro: Euacer platanoides, commonly known as the Chinese catalpa, is a deciduous tree native to eastern Asia. It belongs to the family Bignoniaceae and is characterized by its heart-shaped leaves and showy, pendulous flowers. The tree produces long, woody pods that contain flat, seed-containing structures.
